'''Sadwyn Brophy''' (b. [[13 September|September 13]],<ref>[https://www.facebook.com/SadwynB/ Sadwyn Brophy] at Facebook, see message posted on 13 September 2018.</ref> [[1996]]) is an actor and the son of actor [[Jed Brophy]]. He played [[Eldarion]] in a vision seen by [[Arwen]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''.
